title: 36 Crazyfists Studio Albums Discography FLAC
description:
36 Crazyfists Studio Albums

Time and Trauma (2015)

 1.  Vanish
 2.  11.24.11
 3.  Sorrow Sings
 4.  Lightless
 5.  Time And Trauma
 6.  Also Am I
 7.  Translator
 8.  Silencer
 9.  Slivers
 10. Swing The Noose
 11. Gathering Bones
 12. Marrow


All albums are in FLAC format with the exception of their first one, In the Skin from 1997. The best I could do was CBR 192 kbps. Also, there is one track from The Tide and Its Takers that I could not get a FLAC copy of (track 6, Only A Year or So...). That track is encoded in .mp3, LAME 3.97, VBR -V 2 (Standard). Other than that, all other tracks are FLAC. Please seed, and enjoy!
